page.title: 04SKIPPING GAMES IN OAKLEY
page.content: There are many{skipping rhymes}that are sung but maybe the most popular is {"POLLY IN THE KITCHEN".}This can be played with five or more people and a long rope.Two people hold the ends of the rope and swing it round as normal then one person starts to skip and the rest sing{"Polly in the kitchen,doing {a bit o'stitching.In pops a bogey man {and out jumps she!"}At the words "In comes a bogey man" another person jumps in and Polly jumps out.This carries on until you want to change. The simplest game is {"SCALES".}The first person goes right under the rope without jumping everyone follows her doing the same,when it comes round to the first persons turn again she jumps once,the game carries on like this till ten is reached,then you work your way down to one.
